hero.title: Build with Precision, Craft with Passion
hero.subtitle: Multi-Engineering & Creative Freelance Hub — Hire top talent or find work.

about.text: MEC WORKS connects top engineering and creative freelancers with clients. We vet every professional to ensure quality and timely delivery. From code to construction, we've got you covered. Our platform simplifies hiring and project management for both parties.

news.title: New Robotics Workshop
news.description: Join us for a hands-on robotics session in March. Industry experts will guide.

news.title: labours adda beta
news.description: Skilled labour app enters closed beta. Register interest now.

news.title: Client portal upgrade
news.description: New dashboard for clients to track projects in real-time.
